system.useTime:
Unbound: Psy 7, 
Once-Bound: Psy 6
Twice-Bound: Psy 5, 
Thrice-Bound: Psy 4
Khorne Daemonhosts do not gain Psychic Powers. Powers should be appropriate for the patron god of the Daemonhost.
system.novice:
Generate unholy changes based on bound-level. Either rolled for or simply chosen by GM. 
Unbound: Three Changes. Once-Bound: two Changes. Twice-Bound: two Changes. Thrice-Bound: one change.
These are examples, the GM is free to apply something else that is fitting.
